boardgame.name: Warhammer 40,000
Warhammer 40,000 (first edition)
Warhammer 40,000 (second edition)
Warhammer 40,000 (third edition)
boardgame.description: Warhammer 40,000 is a table-top miniature-based war game set in a dystopian future. Although usually played by two players, theoretically any number of players can participate at once._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Players can choose one of a number of factions from within the Warhammer 40,000 universe - examples include, humanity's defenders, the Space Marines and Imperial Guard, the nearly extinct race of Elder, the all-consuming Tyranids or the corrupted once-human forces of Chaos. Each race also how their own sub-groups and flavours - for example there are Chapters of Space Marines with their own specialisations, whilst a Chaos army that worships the war-god Khorne would look very different to one worshiping the pleasure god Slaanesh._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Players select their armies based on the miniatures they own. To ensure balance each miniature is assigned a points value (with the value rising for optional upgrades) and players usually agree a points limit for each army before play. Similarly, players will agree the rules and victory conditions for a specific scenario._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Each turn proceeds in phases covering movement, melee combat, ranged combat and so forth. No game board is used, players make or purchase their own scenery. Physical measurement is used to determine movement and weapon range, with dice used to calculate everything from damage to morale and the effectiveness of physic powers. Special 'scatter dice' are used to calculate random or quasi-random events such as the movement of a gas cloud or fire._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Games usually last for a specified number of turns, after which the player who has accumulated the most victory points (by achieving pre-set goals and destroying enemy miniatures) is the winner._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Expansions and new armies are regularly released for Warhammer 40,000, with new editions of the game itself being released roughly every four years._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;
boardgame.boardgamehonor: 1993 Origins Awards Best Miniatures Rules Winner
2003 Origins Awards Hall of Fame Inductee
boardgame.boardgameversion: Games Workshop English third edition rulebook

listing.notes: Never played and all figures still on their spurs. This is the 3rd edition. Shipping is $14.95 US. Will combine shipping. Will ship worldwide. Just ask for a quote first.

I am selling the following unopened and still in shrink boxes: Space Marines Terminator Squad Space Marines Assault Squad Space Marines Scouts with Sniper Space Marine Dreadnought

Copy for sale is the 1993 edition. All components present (but 6 space marines as described below), unpunched, still on sprues. All components in mint condition. Box in decent condition, in one piece and easily holds components. One corner torn, one fixed with clear tape (as shown on photo below). Shelfwear to edges all round. 4 space marines sprayed with white undercoat (as shown on photo below). 6 space marines with bolters missing (like the ones shown on photo below). This game weighs over 2kg. P_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;P to UK is £6.99, to USA is £33, to Finland is £27. I will consider offers. SAVE P_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;P COSTS! - You can collect in person from Virginia Water (Surrey) near Heathrow, just drop me a line first.
